snippet: The United States budget deficit shrank by $52 billion, or 14 percent, during the first nine months of the 2015 fiscal year versus year-ago figures.
abstract: Congressional Budget Office reports that United States budget deficit diminished by $52 billion, or 14 percent, during first nine months of 2015 fiscal year.
lead_paragraph: The United States budget deficit shrank by $52 billion, or 14 percent, during the first nine months of the 2015 fiscal year versus year-ago figures.

headline.main: U.S. Budget Deficit Is Down $52 Billion, C.B.O. Says
headline.print_headline: U.S. Budget Deficit Is Down $52 Billion, C.B.O. Says
